Class KeyBindings

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.controls.KeyBindings
public class KeyBindings extends Object
Pure model class that stores key mappings for game actions. This separates assignment logic from JavaFX UI code so it can be unit tested.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    KeyBindings()
    Create a new KeyBindings model populated with sensible defaults.

  • Constructor Details

    • KeyBindings

      public KeyBindings()
      Create a new KeyBindings model populated with sensible defaults.

      Defaults are copied into both the panel defaults and current mapping so the UI will display values out of the box.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public javafx.scene.input.KeyCode get(Action a)
      Return the currently assigned key for the given action.
      Parameters:
      a - action to query
      Returns:
      assigned KeyCode or null if none

    • set

      public void set(Action a, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code)
      Assign a key to an action in the current mapping.
      Parameters:
      a - action to assign
      code - key to assign

    • findActionForKey

      public Action findActionForKey(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code)
      Find which action (if any) is bound to the given key in the current mapping.
      Parameters:
      code - key to search for
      Returns:
      the Action bound to the key or null if none

    • resetToDefaults

      public void resetToDefaults()
      Reset the current mapping to the global defaults.

    • resetToPanelDefaults

      public void resetToPanelDefaults()
      Reset the current mapping to the panel-specific defaults.

    • setPanelDefault

      Set a panel default for an action.
      Parameters:

      code - default key

      Returns:
      panel default key or null
